00032 #ifndef _LIBLESS_TIMING_H_
00033         #define _LIBLESS_TIMING_H_
00034 
00038         #define INIT_TIMING()                                                                                                   \
00039                 struct timespec _t0, _t1;                                                                                       \
00040                 long int _result;
00041 
00045         #define TIMING_BEFORE()                                                                                                 \
00046                 clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROF, &_t0);
00047 
00051         #define TIMING_AFTER()                                                                                                  \
00052                 clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROF, &_t1);
00053 
00059         #define COMPUTE_TIMING(FUNCTION)                                                                                \
00060                 _result = ((long)_t1.tv_sec - (long)_t0.tv_sec) * 1000000;                      \
00061                 _result += (_t1.tv_nsec - _t0.tv_nsec) / 1000;                                          \
00062                 printf("TIMING: %s time: %ld microsec\n", #FUNCTION, _result);
00063                 
00064         #ifndef TIMING
00065                 #undef INIT_TIMING
00066                 #undef TIMING_BEFORE
00067                 #undef TIMING_AFTER
00068                 #undef COMPUTE_TIMING
00069                 #define INIT_TIMING() /* empty */
00070                 #define TIMING_BEFORE() /* empty */
00071                 #define TIMING_AFTER() /* empty */
00072                 #define COMPUTE_TIMING(FUNCTION) /* empty */
00073         #endif
00074 
00075 #endif /* !_LIBLESS_ERR_H_ */
